common.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
common.serverError: Server error. Please try again later
common.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection
common.validationError: Please check your input and try again
common.badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input
common.gone: The requested resource is no longer available

auth.accountDisabled: Account is disabled or not verified
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later
auth.emailMismatch: Token does not match user email

certificate.recipientInvalid: Specify exactly one of studentId or teamId
certificate.duplicate: Certificate already exists for this recipient and template
certificate.templateDownloadFailed: Failed to download certificate template file
certificate.issuanceFailed: An unexpected error occurred during certificate issuance

contest.duplicate: A contest with this name already exists
contest.registrationClosed: Registration for this contest is closed
contest.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered for this contest
contest.dateInvalid: Start date cannot be later than end date
contest.invalidImage: Uploaded file is not a valid image
contest.invalidState: Contest is in invalid state for this operation
contest.dateConflict: Contest dates conflict with existing schedule

leaderboard.frozen: Leaderboard is frozen and cannot be updated
leaderboard.teamEliminated: This team has been eliminated and cannot receive new scores
leaderboard.invalidEliminationRule: Elimination rule policy is not valid
leaderboard.toggleFreezeInvalidStatus: Cannot toggle freeze status. Contest must be Ongoing or Paused

mentor.userInvalidStatus: User must be Active or Inactive
mentor.userAlreadyMentor: This user is already a mentor
mentor.inUse: Cannot delete a mentor who is assigned to teams

problem.rubricTemplateNotAvailable: Rubric template is only available for manual problem types
problem.mockTestNotProvided: No mock test file was provided
problem.mockTestInvalidType: Mock test file must be a Python file
problem.mockTestSizeExceeded: Mock test file size exceeds the limit
problem.mockTestWrongType: Mock tests can only be uploaded for AutoEvaluation problems

province.inUse: Cannot delete a province that is in use

quiz.alreadyFinished: You have already finished this round
quiz.openCodeRequired: Open code is required to access this quiz
quiz.bankNameRequired: Bank name is required in first row
quiz.invalidCsv: CSV file contains no valid question rows
quiz.keyMismatch: Key does not belong to the current student

roleRegistration.evidenceRequired: At least 1 evidence file is required
roleRegistration.registrationExists: A pending role registration already exists for this email
roleRegistration.notPending: Only pending registrations can be processed
roleRegistration.invalidRole: RequestedRole must be staff, organizer, judge, schoolmanager, or admin

round.penaltyRateInvalid: Penalty rate must be between 0 and 1
round.cannotUpdate: Cannot update round while it is in 'Opened' status
round.dateConflict: Round dates conflict with existing round
round.noJudgesAvailable: No judges available for this contest
round.alreadyFinished: You have already finished this round
round.cannotEndBeforeStart: Cannot end round before it starts
round.topCutoffRequired: Your team is not in Top cutoff of the previous round

school.inUse: Cannot delete a school that has students, mentors, or teams
school.nameExists: School name already exists in this province

student.userAlreadyStudent: This user is already a student
student.inUse: Cannot delete a student with related records

submission.fileRequired: File is required for File evaluation type
submission.codeRequired: Code is required for Code evaluation type
submission.noTestCases: No test cases found for problem
submission.rubricEvaluationOnly: Rubric evaluation is only available for manual problem types
submission.noRubricCriteria: No rubric criteria found for this problem
submission.scoreExceedsMax: Score exceeds max score for criterion
submission.noManualTestSubmission: No manual test submission found for this round
submission.plagiarismNotSuspected: Submission is not in plagiarism suspected state
submission.noMockTest: This problem does not have a mock test configured

team.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this team
team.alreadyProcessed: This invitation has already been processed
team.mentorNotBelongToSchool: This mentor does not belong to the selected school
team.nameExists: A team with this name already exists in the contest
team.mentorContestLimitExceeded: A mentor can have only one active team in the same contest
team.inUse: Cannot delete a team that has related records
team.contestStarted: Contest has started. Team cannot be modified

teamInvite.alreadyOnTeam: Student is already on a team for this contest
teamInvite.timeConflict: Student has a time conflict with another contest

teamInvite.inviteNotForYou: This invite is for a different student
teamInvite.accountRequired: Please register with the invited email first
teamInvite.notStudent: Only students can accept team invites

testCase.dataRequired: Test case data cannot be null
testCase.fieldTooLong: Description, Input and ExpectedOutput must be 255 characters or less
testCase.timeLimitInvalid: TimeLimitMs must be a positive integer if provided
testCase.listEmpty: Test case list cannot be null or empty
testCase.duplicateIds: Duplicate test case IDs found in the request
testCase.cannotDelete: Only test cases of type 'TestCase' can be deleted
testCase.notAvailable: Test cases are only available for AutoEvaluation problems
